meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7641.

td.p: Caity Willox, a course logistics specialist from Skokie, Illinois
Hilary Fried, a retired box office cashier from Milford, Connecticut
Marcus Gresham, a WRAP facilitator from Corydon, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,401)

tr.td: KEEP IT DOWN
MOUNTAINS
RANKING THE NEW MILITARY MAN
NOTABLE NAMES
THINK PINK
RHYME TIME
